title: Ukraine Says Reviewing Cases on Company That Hired Biden's Son
text:
(Bloomberg) -- Ukraine’s top prosecutor said all cases involving a company that hired former U.S. Vice President Joe Biden’s son are being audited, though no one’s sought to influence him on any investigations.

Donald Trump has pushed for a probe into Biden and his son, who used to do business in Ukraine. Democrats have begun impeachment hearings, saying the request targeting a key political rival before next year’s election constitutes an abuse of the presidential office.

Prosecutor General Ruslan Ryaboshapka said Friday that all cases relating Burisma, a natural gas company where Hunter Biden sat on the board, will be assessed and checked for evidence of impropriety.

To contact the reporter on this story: Kateryna Choursina in Kiev at kchoursina@bloomberg.net

To contact the editors responsible for this story: Andrea Dudik at adudik@bloomberg.net, Andrew Langley, Andras Gergely
